isuues.value: ANDHRA PRADESH->East Godavari, Srikakulam, Visakhapatnam, Vizianagaram

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Promoted six Sakrushi Thrift and Credit Societies with an enrollment of 2820 rural women and registered under MACS Act 199. They are self reliant. Imparted Vocational Skills to 6175 Women and Youth with the support of NABARD, CAPART, FVTRS and Ministry of Youth Affairs and promoted them as rural entrepreneurs. We have mainstreamed 8400 out of School Children, Child Labour and migrant children into Formal Schools by enhancing their competencies with the support of SSA,NCLP and MHRD. Provided skills to 3000 + Farmers in organic Farming and sustainable Agriculture with the support of MISEREOR- Germany, NABARD, ICRISAT-Hyderabad and Department of Agriculture, GOAP. Created demand for individual Household latrines in 20 GPs of Srikakulam District and facilitated 10000 Families to construct IHHLs under SBM with the support of UNICEF under AASRA Project. Identified 1440 HRGs{940 FSWs + 500 MSMs and TGs } and providing them behavior change communication, condom services, STI treatment services and referral services with the support of APSACS-Vijayawada under Target Intervention Project. Care and Support was extended to 1112 HIV effected and infected Children and their families in 7 Revenue Mandals of Srikakulam District and mainstreamed them with Govt.Schemes/NGO s with the support of Global Fund 6th round/Alliance India HIV/AIDS. Capacitated 150 Tribal farmers in Vana Samrakshana samitis in Tribal sub-plan area of Visakhapatnam with the support of CEFNARM, Deptt. of Forests and Environment. Capacitated 2025 farmers in 11 WUAs in 11 villages to make better use of Irrigation tanks and promoted livelihoods after renovated irrigation tanks with the support of Irrigation and CAD Dept. and CAPART. Implementing CHILDLINE Project with the support of CHILDLINE India Foundation supported by Ministry of WCD for providing Care & protection to Childtren at Risk in Srikakulam District under Collab.Scheme. Promoted Producers Organization for 500 Jute Farmers with the support of NABARD. Promoted 2 Handicrafts Clusters in Jute and leather Puppet Crafts in Srikakulam and East Godavari Districts under AHVY Scheme with the support of O/o the DC(Handicrafts),Ministry of Textiles, GOI.

sourceOfFunds.purpose: Zion Devotional Charity Welfare Society was recognized for the commitment towards the people in Jaggayyapet Town and rural area. Because of our hard work and commitment to the assigned programmes, we have been sanctioned by the District Medical and Health Department to conduct Urban Health Centre and its activities in 18, 19, 20, 21, 22, 23, 24 and 25 wards of Jaggayyapet town. In this UHC one Qualified MBBS Doctor, two ANMs and one Community Organizer will be available and medicines

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: To Empower Poor and Vulnerable Youth to Become entrepreneurs. To Focus on Youth in Rural and urban areas to provide them Grants and start up Kits example. Sewing machines, beautician Start up Kits, Breakfast centers, Garments Business, Fancy Store Business for women Empowerment to generate their own Income To Provide Health and Hygiene Training helping them with clean water tanks and mosquito nets To Provide Free Evening Education center in the slums. To provide bore wells in rural areas

sourceOfFunds.purpose: Empowerment Programs in Slums. Focusing on youth (men/women) in Rural and urban Area to empower and help to become Entrepreneurs to get income generation with their small business not to relay on Charity . To Provide Sewing Machines, Beautician Kits, Breakfast centers, selling Garments, etc to make the women empowerment strong To Provide Free Evening Education centers in the slums To Provide drinking water by digging bore wells in the rural Areas. To Give Health and Hygiene Training.
